content.detailedDescription: I was visiting a friend in lancaster, wi on the 4th of july and we went out to her back patio to listen to music that was being played by her neighbors.  i spotted the orb like object in the sky and had her look at it and we both agreed we had never seen anything like it.  it had no sound, no lights and was traveling at a fairly good speed.  it went behind some trees and i didn't think much about it until it came back again and then the two of us walked to her back yard and watched it for several minutes until it went out of sight.  it was sort of a teardrop shape and was an orange/red color.  this appeared between 9:45 and 10:00 o'clock p.M.
content.summary: Saw ufo on th 4th of july in lancaster wi

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out by field investigator l.F. at mufon hq with witness on phone 7/9/2013
___________________________________________________________________________

i was coming out of an office building, it was 12:20 pm, around noon, it was raining, i happened to look up and see this large silver saucer shape coming out of a rain cell. it floated down like a boat on the ocean in the waves. it came out of the rain cloud and hovered for about 2 minutes. it was about a football field high above me. i stared at it in the parking lot and tried to get other people to look up at it in the rain. when i finally looked away, i closed my eyes and i could still see the light from the silver craft. it didn't appear to be that bright, but it seemed to be temporarily burned in my retinas. it then just moved normal speed toward the north. right after that i saw two jets chasing it. 
this sighting has changed me, and i would like to know what it was and if anyone else saw it.
content.summary: I was coming out of an office building, it was raining, i happened to look up and see this large silver saucer shape coming out of a rain cell

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling south on interstate 5 about a mile from the sutherlin exit when we first noticed the light. at first we thought it was a satellite due to the size and brightness of the object. we watched it flying forward toward us for at least 5 minutes before we pulled over and exited the vehicle to get a better look. when we got out of the car i started video taping and the object changed directions. after it flew the other direction for about one minute, it appeared to stop and stay in one place. it stayed stationary for about 3 more minutes at which point another brightly lit object was ejected from the bottom of the craft. the object that was emitted flashed several times as it exited and then disappeared. at that time, the original object seemed to fly straight up until it was so high we couldn't see it anymore. i have a great video of this and 3 other people that were also witnesses to the event.
content.summary: Lighted object changed directions and then hovered in one place before ejecting another bright lighted object out from the bottom of the craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Pursuing light beam, walked directly into biblical baptism.  contact now regular, ongoing, increasing in intensity.


zoom in photos attached approx. 2x, staying in creek, he is standing on a log.  implications are reunion of world's major religions and rapid scientific advances.

did not see craft but got picture of interdimensional being.  found small flattened area later where craft likely landed.  did not take samples.
content.summary: Biblical baptism, prophesy

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq by field investigator l.F.With witness on phone.
________________________________________________________________________

on july third at 6:00 am i was watching the sun come up and saw some chem trails that made three x's  in the sky so i decided to take pictures of them. when i looked at the pictures later i saw two orbs in two of the pictures. one was straight up in the sky and gray colored with a distinctive shape and some appendages on it, the second picture showed a violet orb, tree top level with a fuzzy outline. i have pictures of the orbs but when i tried to download to the report it wouldn't work.
content.summary: On july third at 6:00 am i was watching the sun come up and saw some chem trails that made three x's  in the sky so i deceided to take pictures of them.

content.detailedDescription: This would take way too long . i dont feel like writing a ten page essay. in short.I witnessed a triangle craft with three lights. days later i witnessed an oval transparent "beacon" for lack of a better word. go over my home . days after that tje triangle craft made an appearance over my back yard only twenty feet away. the craft basically spoke to me in the voice i use to think and told me to come outside.It shot a beam like a lazer printer into my left eye. i believe this was my first missing time event. there have been a lot of other events but im doing this on my cell phone and its not really how id like to do this. i have received what i perceive as marks of some type of proceedures. scoop mark and the like. as i said there is a lot to tell but i dont have internet and this is on my phone. the scoop mark happened dec 2014. it was after this physical proof that i have been looking for a field investigator. i have been in touch with psi-can who wrote a story based loosley on my events. the pseudonym joe taylor .
content.summary: Cant be done ive only included one sighting of many events.

content.detailedDescription: This would take way too long . i dont feel like writing a ten page essay. in short.I witnessed a triangle craft with three lights. days later i witnessed an oval transparent "beacon" for lack of a better word. go over my home . days after that tje triangle craft made an appearance over my back yard only twenty feet away. the craft basically spoke to me in the voice i use to think and told me to come outside.It shot a beam like a lazer printer into my left eye. i believe this was my first missing time event. there have been a lot of other events but im doing this on my cell phone and its not really how id like to do this. i have received what i perceive as marks of some type of proceedures. scoop mark and the like. as i said there is a lot to tell but i dont have internet and this is on my phone. the scoop mark happened dec 2014. it was after this physical proof that i have been looking for a field investigator. i have been in touch with psi-can who wrote a story based loosley on my events. the pseudonym joe taylor .
content.summary: Cant be done ive only included one sighting of many events.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq by field investigator l.F. for witness while on the phone. 7/9/2015.  witness has no computer.
________________________________________________________________________

in july of 2013, from 10 pm to 10:30 pm, i was walking my dog and then sat on the pier with my dog watching the stars. i saw a bigger than normal star moving across the sky, i watched and was amazed when it stopped  and then shot straight up into the sky and disappeared. it came from the west and went toward the south east. i was on the lake prickerel pier, which is about 260 miles from milwaukee. there was no moon, and i can't remember the exact day, but it was one with no moon. i watch the stars all the time and have seen satellites, comets, meteors, and even the northern lights. i have never seen anything like this before, can i find out if anyone else saw this too, and what it might have been?
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: In july of 2013 i was sitting on the pier with my dog watching the stars and saw a bigger than normal star moving across the sky, i watched and was amazed when it stopped

content.detailedDescription: During fireworks celebration my wife and i were standing in our front yard and noticed that there wasa orb that looked like a firework that was slowly floating in a straight line across the sky.  it was only 1 at a time, and was not a plane or helicopter.  this occurred many times.  the orb would glide slowly across our field of vision.  we ran in to get a camera to see if we could get a close up of it, to make out what it could be.  no matter how much we zoomed in it was a round orb.  in our excitement we didnt video it which i am very irritated with myself about.  i have no idea what this was but it was no firework as they couldnt keep going that slowly for such a long time.  we also arent sure if it was the same one that kept going around but we would lose site of it over our house and we would see what could be another one in just a few second after that one went away.  we didn't see it circle, it just went straight which makes me think it was several in a line, like they were trying to blend in with the fireworks.
content.summary: Fireball slowly gliding across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Filming the sun with a smartphone, app. 42 seconds into video, blueish square or rectangle appears for less than a second on left top side of sun
content.summary: Square or rectangle in shape, blue in color, visible for less than a second near sun in space

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with several other people, checking out cuenca (town), which is located in ecuador. this was after dinner, so at night time. i looked up and saw a bright orange object in the night sky, and pointed it out to the others. we couldn't figure out what it was. it was just hovering there. it didn't appear to be a tower, as it was not connected to anything, and it was right above us. nor did it appear to be a flare (no fireworks then). it was completely silent and just hovering there. we watched it for a couple of minutes. then we just went about our business exploring the town.
content.summary: Saw an orange object hovering in the night sky, while walking around in cuenca (town), ecuador.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fireworks on july 4 2015 around 10:15pm in the front part of the home when i saw this bright orange object coming out of the northwest and notice it was coming this way towards my father house. i hurry up real quick to get my father come outside. my father also saw this flying over the house at a straight pattern going over the house. i went towards the back side of the property watch it flying in southeast direction and disappeared less then minute and it was out of site. my father describe as bright orange orb flying south with flames all round it. both us were puzzled and don't know what it could be except a ufo. this thing look like a flying sun without noise being made.
content.summary: I was watching fireworks and notice a fire orange fireball in the sky out the nw sky fiying towardmy dad home.

content.detailedDescription: I was young so i don't know what year it was or my age but it was probably 1961-62 or so. i shared a bedroom with my younger sister and her bed/crib? was closer to the window than mine. it was a hot summer night and my dad had found this large air conditioner and installed it in our room and he was sleeping on the floor at the foot of our beds. i woke up in the middle of the night and looked out the window and saw a cigar shaped craft hovering. i felt like "they" were looking at me although i don't remember seeing windows or beings. it hovered there then moved forward toward the east. my dad and sister slept through it. i told my dad about it the next morning and he told me it was a dream. my dad was a mechanical engineer and worked for an aeronautics company. he had some level of top secret clearance from the government. he has several patents under his name. i just sent another report of an event that happened at lake waubesa south of madison that happened a few years later. i don't recall any more events but we do have some paranormal activity in our current house. i woke up around 2:30 am as my husband left the room and i heard the door close. against the white door i could see a small human figure (4-5 ft tall) appear in silhouette. the door was reflected in a standing mirror in front of the bed. i called my husband's name 3 times with no response and i sat up and turned the light on. it was gone. this occurred at my current address about 8-10 years ago.
content.summary: Saw a cigar shaped ufo out the bedroom window

content.detailedDescription:
There were several people (friends and family) outside at several stages of inhibriation remaining from the 4th of july fireworks that ended 1/2hr prior. the sky was overcast with some bright stars and, i believe, the constellation sagitarius visible directly above. i'm not sure of exactly which one, whatever, but i then looked nw along the ridge line, we live along the kanawha river valley, and saw the ufo.
it was a bright red and orange egg-shaped object, no more than 2-5mi away, in a stationary position and that is when i went for my iphone 5s and started to record video after all were in agreement that it was what i was seeing. in the video you will hear a female voice describe it's movement, but it remained in a still position for a few minutes and then headed along the ridge line toward us. as it came closer i was able to notice the lights in the middle and they were a greenish color, the lights were extremely bright so it was hard to be certain of the middle color, but from there it appeared as if the top and bottom were disjointed leaving me to believe that it was also "wobbling" as it was in motion.
after the motion it once again stopped for a few moments and i got a straight on look at it once again. it was now in a steady position as if it were "checkin' us out" and from there it headed straight upwards. now to explain the "vanishing" is kind of hard to detail due to it being night and also being unaware of the specific cloud cover, but i can only give two theories as to what i saw from there. regardless of clouds the lights were so bright that it would have been hard for the clouds to hide so much of it so easily right away. what i saw is it looked like it dissipated as if it went through a "worm-hole" kind of like einstein explained in his theory of relativity and the 4th plane or dimension. i'm not a ufo enthusiast and i'm not college educated, but i am a navy veteran and was taught attention to detail, so that is the basis for the recollection...
content.summary: Witnessed and video of stationary, moving, and then ascent to nowhere

content.detailedDescription: My family spent some time every summer at my great grandparent's cottage on lake waubesa. the cottage was located on the eastern side of the lake on crescent drive, south of the lake waubesa bible camp. i don't know the exact month, date or year but it was before 1966 and probably was 1964 or 65. we were friends with the people who owned the 2 cottages nest to us. the adults went in the boat to the bar across the lake and left all of us kids, approximately 10-12 of us, at the cottages. it was after dark so probably between 9-10 pm. we were outside playing and noticed 3 discs with 3 different colored lights on the perimeter edge. i'm not positive but i think the lights were spinning around the edge or blinking. they were located northwest to where we were, towards madison. they sat there and we discussed them and one of the older girls said that it was a flying saucer or ufo. they weren't too high above the horizon and were across the lake from us. no sound or movement was noticed. we got scared and ran into the nearest cottage. we told the adults when they got back but they didn't see anything. i recently asked my sisters about it and one remembered the event as i do, one said she doesn't remember it at all, and i never heard from my 3rd sister. i don't know how to get a hold of the other people. i would have been about 9 or 10. the cottage was torn down a long time ago and was replaced by a large home.
content.summary: 3 disc shaped craft across lake waubesa toward madison 1964-65

content.detailedDescription: I was seeing a friend to his car and we were both standing in the street talking before he left.  the sky was very bright due to low hanging cloud cover reflecting ambient light from the city/neighborhoods.  as we were talking, i looked west toward my house and notice above, in the sky, a light moving northward.  it was not blinking in a regular manor, rather it was solid for several seconds then it would go off...Then blink then go solid.  no apparent pattern.  at this point it sunk in that the light was coming from an object and the object was moving very slowly and not making any noise at all.  i asked my friend to take a look at the light, which he did.  we noticed at that point a second object following behind it.  both objects looked, moved and behaved in the same way.  the second object appeared to be about 5 seconds behind the other.  at first i thought maybe it was a drone as did my friend.  however it seemed very large in comparison to the drones i have seen people use at parks or the beach.  also, the overall shape of the object was more dense and did not appear to to have any room on its body to accommodate propellers.  my friend joked that we were being spied on and to make sure i keep an eye out for people showing up to ask questions.  we both laughed and continued to watch the objects.  at this point we had been watching the objects for about 10 seconds.  suddenly i noticed the second one was no longer there and the the first one was becoming obscured by a cloud.  the clouds seemed to be low hanging.  the first object passed into the cloud and out during a time that its light was on.  it was then that i started questioning the size of the object.  i would say it was at least a large as a  large round dinner table, if not larger.  we both looked at each other and kind of laughed it off.  it came out of the cloud again and continued heading north/north-east.  the total observation time was about 30 seconds or more.  it was still heading on its course when my friend and i starting talking about other things.  i would mention that i live less than 5 miles from a major international airport and it is my understanding that drones are not permitted to operate in the area.
content.summary: Two craft heading north, no sound, moving very slowly.

content.detailedDescription: My grandfather only spoke of his service time on a few occasions, when i was a child he had a white part of his wrist that he told me was a tan line from his military watch, it was a permanent tan line. the tan line was visible for more than 30 yrs. my grandfather had served in the army at first, where he was in watch towers, and seen alien aircraft the first time in panama. during his time he contracted malaria, and was sent home. he than enlists and works for the air force, where he met my grandmother and married her. my father was conceived during this time my grandfather was in the air force in ohio at right patterson afb, and he was born 4/24/1954, full term he weighed 3 lbs. my father was 2 years old and his blood turned to water. my grandfather had to give him blood transfusions around the clock, after two transfusions the doctors did not want to try to save my father after two failed attempts, and my grandfather insisted, and signed a release that he waived the doctors medical liability in order to try one last transfusion. luckily my father lived. my father age 17 he became government property and received 30 shots a day of human growth hormones daily. at that time my father was only 4 ft 10 inches. my father did make the height of 5 ft 3 inches, and weighed 85 lbs. at the age of 37 yrs old my father was diagnosed terminally ill with stage 4 adenocarcinoma. which was typically seen in a 80 year old patient and died with in 6 months of his diagnoses. upon his death my mother and i received a letter from the united states asking for autopsy results and slides of the cancer. unfortunately no autopsy was done, and for some reason we never were informed that the experimental treatments my father was given may of caused cancer. i was not even sure how the government was informed that my father had died. back in 1992 there was no computers not like today. and we never even were aware that the government was even interested. my grandfather also in the 1960 s was sent to california, from michigan. they lived there for apporoximetly one year, and moved back to mi. which is how my parents met. my father and mother were next door neighbors and good friends since the age of 7 years old. my grandfather only spoke of the aliens once my father had died. i was 21, and i visited him weekly. he told me that yes there were aliens, and he did indeed see them at right patterson base, and in the watch towers while in panama. my grandfather did take most of the secrets with him to his grave. it was so much of a shock for me to hear him speak of this, because he never really did, i wish i would of asked him more. he was so admirable, my father and he were a masters at building electrical and could learn any skill or trade. they were so intelligent and mastered any skill they tried. i find it upsetting that the government possibly knew that my father was exposed to cancer causing agents and even knew he passed and how to send information asking for autopsy results, yet could not inform him that he was at risk and to go have a regular medical check up. my grandfather also died of cancer 15 years later.
content.summary: Na

content.detailedDescription:
Last night after 3 am (local time), in half-sleep, when i tried to turn over in my bed i become paralyzed. i couldn't even open my eyes, or breath. after about 40 seconds of struggling, i manage to open my eyes enough to see that i am still inside my room. i saw human like figure standing next to my bed. it was between 1.40-1.55 meters tall, dark-grey skin, 3 long fingers on each hand, big black eyes. i was unable to see it's feets because it was standing next to my bed, and bed sheets was covering both of his legs.
   few seconds after i manage to open my eyes a little bit, i hear my brother (which bed is next to mine) take a deep breath, like he wasn't able to breath certain amount of time. i watch that creature directly into eyes and suddenly i wasn't paralyzed any more. it turned head and looked trough window. when i realised that i am no longer paralyzed, i stand up and approach to window, i wasn't afraid of alien creature behind me. i look trough window and saw many flying ships on sky going over top of next building (20-25 m high). flying objects was different in shapes and sizes. i wasn't anymore in my room, i could see approximatly between 300 and 400 flying ships. surface of flying objects was black without any reflection. but borders of windows (or i don't know what exactly, square shape) was glowing with light blue or yellow light. i hv seen it so clear, any border, bend, nut or window on that flying objects, without any blur or fog. so many flying ships was surrounding me, i only could see earth beneath. shape of ships was irregular square, triangle, and smaller ships was arrow like with flat nose. biggest ships was around 30 x 20 x 150 meters, and have something like landing pads for smaller ships. triangle shaped ships was very similar to b2 military aircraft, but double in size and with flat nose. medium size ships was grouped around biggest ships in circles, and around that in formation was placed triangle-shaped ships. all ships was going in one direction in formation like fleet of some kind.
   next thing i remember i was in my bed at about 8 am (local time). i asked my brother about last night, but he doesn't remember anything because he was in deep sleep, but my mother hear something sneaking around the house last night, but she assumed that was just the wind and continue sleeping.
   i didn't report anything to authorities because i am to afraid to do that.
content.summary: Alien in room during night, many flying objects on sky different in size and shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my son's house getting ready to leave for home. when the wife and i stepped out i looked up into the night's sky and saw a green orb like light moving west towards the moon. you can see the green orb through the clouds. i have on more photo that i did not post. it was to far away for me to hear anything. i don't believe it was a plane or anything i'm familiar with.
content.summary: Looked up and saw this green orb in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were on lunch break at 9pm because i work 2nd shift and we saw a bright orange light heading north.I was pointing it out to my friend and when i did the light turned off and it made a sharp turn towards the northwestern.We could see a dark black cigar shaped object.It was still light out and i was dumbfounded as to why this object was dark black with the sun out..I grabbed a pair of binoculars to try to see it better and it was gone.This is the second sighting i've had in the past few months.I reported the 1st sighting as well.
content.summary: Three of us where outside on lunch break and observed a very bright orange light flying north..I pointed it out to my two friends and that's when the light just turned off and made a sharp turn and headed north westerly.

content.detailedDescription: I believe this was in a town outside of denver known as snowmass, i was just 12 years old and we just pulled up to the hotel area, i believe this was outside the parking area, i just felt compelled to take a photograph. i don't remember seeing anything visually out of the ordinary but after developing the film this was the photo i took. i don't know how to explain what i am seeing, but there it is.
content.summary: Invisible to the eye just a phorograph

content.detailedDescription: It was higher than any commercial plane i've witnessed. too high to hear any noise from it. i took a photo, but it was from a mobile phone. so quality is not too good.It flew in a straight line, however on the picture it appears to have "something" around it. possibly just burning up coming through the atmosphere?
content.summary: It was higher than any commercial plane i've witnessed. too high to hear any noise from it.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the dark night and smoking a cigarette, suddenly a big bright light (1/4 size of the moon) went horizontally over the horizon... i was behind the trees, so i didn't see the whole path, but when i ran to a higher place for better view, it just disappeared. the event took approximately 10 secs and scared the sh*t out of me :-)
content.summary: Big bright (1/4 size of the moon!) and really fast light

content.detailedDescription: After a fun night celebrating the 4th of july with my family,  we got home pretty late around 11:35 pm. all four of us where super tired,when all of a sudden my brother in law seen a light and told me to check it out. me and my girlfriend looked to see what he was talking about, at first glance these lights appeared to be a plane flying over. we are use to seeing and hearing planes fly by all the time, but this was no airplane or helicopter. this was a ufo flying low over mobile homes and a hill close by, a mile from our home. the ufo appeared out of no where with orange, red an white color ufo.  seeing this ufo live was amazing, because it appeared to be pretending to be a plane flying low.Fire works where going off, with the ufo appearing to like the show. but got spoked when a fire work exploded close to the ufo, this is when the ufo took off at unbelievable speeds. this is freaky technology these aliens or other entitys of some kind have a craft that can move like nothing we have on planet earth. this is not my first rodeo,i have seen ufos in the past at my home where i grew up. the good news is i manage to record this event with my smartphone, finally i have some proof to share. my girlfriend had her smart phone as well and captured this event, i have been reading, watching documentaries on ufos and other real life events that happen around the world. i truly believe in ufos, it's just a reality to me now.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: After a night of fire works with my family, we observed a ufo near our home

content.detailedDescription: Call 6106130088 and get message i left on answering machine
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I left a message at this number i found and they told me to go to this site instead of the one i was on.. 610-613-0088 this number has my message. i'm still in shock,so is my wife and friend!

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke,was looking north from park rapids mn next town north is itasca. i seen a fast moving light nw going w.Fast speed like a shooting star but straight not down as a normal shooting star .Had a blue,green color.Only lasted for a few seconds,was moving faster than a normal shooting star.I look a the stars often as am a smoker and dont sleep well,i smoke outside not in the house so i seen shooting stars before../ i have ols seen 3 red balls in the sky but it was 3/4 months back. 2 red dots on front 1 in center back fallowing same speed going north. same direction going north n w to itasca mn...
content.summary: Fast moving light

content.detailedDescription: It was a miday hike in the trinity alps on bake oven ridge.I was on the south side of the ridge looking to the valley.We were taking a short break.All of a sudden i herd a strong rumble,what sounded like an enormous aircraft in a distance.I instantly wanted to see what we were hearing, then i ran as fast as i could up hill to get a full view of the valley, getting to a good rock perch,it was then we saw"why it is i am righting " an unidentified flying object.In clear view my brother and i both starred at what i thought was a nuclear missle. when we saw it appear i instantly sized it up.The ojects shape and collor was like a silver bullet.This objects size was enormous, in estament it was three to four school busses round, and estament three school busses long.From my view,in distance it was 2 to three hundred yards away.We had a great view of it. the object had the loudest barrel rumble,as if it had g-force behind it,but to our amazement it was going no faster than 20 miles an hour, so from our view we witnessed the flight of the object for about 20-30 seconds.This obect was flying no more than 100 feet obove the valley trees,so it was flying in the valley in which mountain ridges hid it from any other view.The entire ufo looked like pallised steel,held together in sections by pallished rivots.The ufo had no windows for view, on any sides.The ufo had no propellers, no jets, and was not being hoisted by another craft.Also to our amazement as the ufo flew over the trees, it pulled them as if it had g-force.We bothed stared in amazement until it dissapeared past another ridge, and out of our view.I turned to my brother a little worried and talked about getting out of the alps. both my brother and i finished our hike. when i got home i told, and talked about it to a few people, no one seemed to take it for real so i have kept it to myself for the past several years. there were times i tryed to search for the ufo we saw in sittings of others, and pictures of other sittings, but i have come up emty handed....
content.summary: Hiking trinity alps. bake oven. through hiking trails,trinity county.

content.detailedDescription: this is my ufo close encounter that happened in the summer of 1974 in the city of willowick, ohio which is an eastern suburb of cleveland located in lake county(we were right on the lake erie shoreline).It was approximately 10:30pm(et) in the evening when this incident occured. myself and my three friends were walking down the street(e.324th st.) going north towards lake erie heading to the beach at the end of the street where we would often hang out(we were all 17 years old and in between 11th and 12th grade at high school). my house was at the end of the street on the corner. when we were about halfway down the road(parkland crossroads-about 300 yards from the lake)we noticed some strange lights at the end of the street just above the intersection of lakeshore blvd.And e.324th st. we continued walking towards the lights and as we got closer we could see that it was a disc-shaped craft with white round lights going around the middle. it was hovering silently in the same spot at treetop level over the intersection. we continued to walk towards it until we were standing directly underneath the object which was still hovering right above us(it was black in appearance and somewhat larger in diameter than the intersection).We all looked up at it in amazement wondering what it was and why it was there. we stood under the craft observing it for about 10 minutes; then it started slowly drifting horizontally north towards the lake. we followed it across the street to the cliff and down the steps to the beach until we were right under it again. it continued to drift at the same level until it was just over the water when it stopped and suddenly shot straight up vertically into the night sky (no sound) till it was at cloud level in about 2-3 seconds. it then stopped and the lights changed from a circular pattern to a triangle pattern(3 white lights). it then took off at a high rate of speed north towards canada till it was out of sight(there was only like a one second pause in between the two directional changes). after it left we were feeling totally confused and could hardly believe what we had just witnessed. we talked about it for awhile trying to understand what we had just seen, and then we eventually made our separate ways home, still in a state of shock. we told some people about it the next day but no one believed us. we went on with our lives after awhile but the encounter was always in the back of my mind over the years. i wished i would have asked some of the neighbors in the area if they had seen it and i wished i would have had a camera. i don't have photos but the images of the sighting were recorded vividly in my mind(memory). some things that i thought were odd about the incident: 1)no traffic(vehicles)came through the intersection or down the road the whole time of the encounter(about 30 min.) 2)the craft waited till it got over the water to take off(when we weren't under it). 3)the craft transformed from a circular light pattern to a triangle pattern when it got up high in the sky. 4)when i was first standing under the ufo i suddenly got this feeling that a blue light was going to come out of the craft and beam us up to it.I had a momentary feeling of fear about that, but most of the encounter was exciting and fascinating(could the occupants possibly have had a device like that?). sorry it took so long to report this sighting but we didn't have the internet and camera cellphones back then, and we didn't know about mufon or nuforc. i thought for a long time that it was to late to report it but i recently saw a tv show about people who have had similar experiences that didn't report it for 30 years or so but when they got older they needed to get their story out to the world.It gave me hope that my story might be taken seriously. i'm hoping that someone that lived in that area at the time and saw it might read this and come forward also to report it(or try to contact me)so my story could be verifyed. this happened in a dense suburb so i know someone else had to have seen it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc-shaped ufo observed hovering over suburban street intersection

content.detailedDescription: i was working offshore a couple of us were on the back deck of the large supply boat. we were just talking on a smoke break when we thought we saw what looked like a meteor once in a while but was funny because it didn't go across the sky like you normally see. it move fast across the sky in one direction then another direction but when we both saw it we looked at each other and we both were freaking out we had time to talk about what we were seeing when this object became 90 degrees above us and it came straight down we both hit the deck as it came directly down at us and disappeared. as it came down it became larger and larger, then one big flash  i was so scared my friend and i both talked about it and agreed never to talk about it because people would think we were crazy. i am now  wondering if there have ever had anything like this happen to anyone else
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
Sightings were spread over several wks, sometimes i was alone outside of my home observing the stars when the object would go over. i described the glowing object to family members. my wife and i seen this once also. i called my daughter outside on two sightings and she also saw the object. then one night i was telling my other daughter and her husband about these sightings while walking out to their car, and he looked up and said like that. i said yes, then that one turned 90 degrees from the first flightpath and sped off quickly getting smaller as it left our view. that one lasted only about 30 seconds or so.
i have no idea what these were, sometime they would seem to hover or move slowly they were very bright and sometimes close with no noise. other times they would go over at a higher altitude but quite below the clouds, again not making any noise. i felt like that if i told someone they wouldn't believe what i had saw. that is why i would tell my wife, daughters and son in law about them. they were called outside to view some of them with me just to make sure, i was seeing what i thought i was seeing. well: at least they said if i was crazy, then they were to, because they saw it. for a while there i had been watching for shooting stars on clear to slightly cloudy nights when i would see these things. sorry i can't give a better description and have no photos, i can't tell what i don't know. i don't know quite a lot about these. the time my son in law and daughter saw that one it was traveling from south to north slowly and then turned east very quickly leaving quick and fading out of sight. witnesses were at different times, wife, two daughters and  a son in law. i got to wondering if these things were watching me, so i quit checking for them. wierd !
content.summary: Happened several times with family witnesses, once it turned 90 degrees and sped off. don't know what it was.
